title: Artist makes paper-cut artworks for Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics
text:
Feng Shiping demonstrates a paper-cut artwork themed the mascots of the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics. [Photo by Hao Qunying for chinadaily.com.cn]

Feng Shiping, a 57-year-old folk paper-cut artist in Handan, North China's Hebei province, has spent a week making Winter Olympics-themed paper-cuttings as gifts for the 2022 Winter Olympics that will be held in Beijing and Hebei's Zhangjiakou.

The lifelike paper-cuttings were made to represent things associated with the games, including the mascots for the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics and different events' competing figures.
description: Feng Shiping, a 57-year-old folk paper-cut artist in Handan, North China's Hebei province, has spent a week making Winter Olympics-themed paper-cuttings as gifts for the 2022 Winter Olympics that will be held in Beijing and Hebei's Zhangjiakou.
